metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6377 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Out-of-bounds memory write in XKB button actions

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6377` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xnest - 2:21.1.4-2ubuntu1.7~22.04.5
xorg-server-source - 2:21.1.4-2ubuntu1.7~22.04.5
xserver-common - 2:21.1.4-2ubuntu1.7~22.04.5
xserver-xephyr - 2:21.1.4-2ubuntu1.7~22.04.5
xserver-xorg-core - 2:21.1.4-2ubuntu1.7~22.04.5
xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:21.1.4-2ubuntu1.7~22.04.5
xvfb - 2:21.1.4-2ubuntu1.7~22.04.5
No subscription required

xwayland - 2:22.1.1-1ubuntu0.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xorg-server package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:21.1.4-2ubuntu1.7~22.04.5').
xwayland package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:22.1.1-1ubuntu0.9').
